snippet: A teenage Pakistani boy walked into a police station on Friday and shot dead a 65-year-old man accused of blasphemy.
abstract: Teenage boy walks into police station in Sharaqpur, Pakistan, and shoots dead Khalil Ahmad, man accused of blasphemy.
lead_paragraph: A teenage Pakistani boy walked into a police station on Friday and shot dead a 65-year-old man accused of blasphemy.

headline.main: Pakistan: Boy Kills a Jailed Man Who Was Accused of Blasphemy
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Boy Kills a Jailed Man Who Was Accused of Blasphemy
